code: import React from'react';import{BriefcaseIcon}from'@heroicons/react/solid';import{experiences}from'../data';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Experience(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"experience",className:"relative",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container px-5 py-10 mx-auto text-center lg:px-40",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col w-full mb-20",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BriefcaseIcon,{className:"mx-auto inline-block w-10 mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sm:text-4xl text-3xl font-medium title-font mb-4 text-white",children:"Work Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lg:w-2/3 mx-auto leading-relaxed text-base",children:"Here are some of the companies I have worked at."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap -m-4",children:experiences.map(function(experience){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:experience.link,className:"sm:w-1/2 w-100 p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"gallery",className:"absolute inset-0 w-full h-full object-scale-down object-center",src:experience.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-8 py-10 relative z-10 w-full border-4 border-gray-800 bg-gray-900 opacity-0 hover:opacity-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"tracking-widest text-sm title-font font-medium text-green-400 mb-1",children:experience.dates}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title-font text-lg font-medium text-white mb-3",children:experience.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"tracking-widest text-sm title-font font-medium text-green-400 mb-1",children:experience.role}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"leading-relaxed",children:experience.description})]})]})},experience.image);})})]})});}
